title: Chachuna National Park
about: Chachuna National Park  is located in Historical part Kiziki, Dedoplistskaro Municipality, Kakheti, on the boarder of Georgia and Azerbaijan, in the extreme south-east part of Georgia. It represents a managed reserve, which was established on a place, where in the past was national forest base Cachuna. Its total territory is 5200 acres  and includes the river Iori territories. Its 175 km from Tbilisi.
